name: DataBeasts: Fusion-Core
description:
Fusion-Core can only be used on commons, rares, and legendaries. You may fuse two DataBeasts into a new DataBeast.

1 common + 1 common = rare
1 common + 1 rare = rare
1 rare + 1 rare = legendary
1 rare + 1 legendary = legendary
1 legendary + 1 legendary = ethereal

Once a user confirms their choice, a new DataBeast will be created and minted. User will receive 1 edition of the new DataBeast.
